headers.description: Optional HTTP headers sent with every request

insecure.description: Whether to skip TLS verification, can optionally be passed as `AUTHENTIK_INSECURE` environmental variable

token.description: The authentik API token, can optionally be passed as `AUTHENTIK_TOKEN` environmental variable

url.description: The authentik API endpoint, can optionally be passed as `AUTHENTIK_URL` environmental variable

context.description: JSON format expected. Use jsonencode() to pass objects. Defaults to `{}`.

attributes.description: JSON format expected. Use jsonencode() to pass objects. Defaults to `{}`.

background.description: Optional URL to an image which will be used as the background during the flow.

target.description: ID of the object this binding should apply to

block.description:
Customization --- Manage Scope Provider Property mappings

~> This resource is deprecated. Migrate to `authentik_property_mapping_provider_scope`.

kubeconfig.description: JSON format expected. Use jsonencode() to pass objects. Defaults to `{}`.

krb5_conf.description: Custom krb5.conf to use. Uses the system one by default

password_login_update_internal_password.description: If enabled, the authentik-stored password will be updated upon login with the Kerberos password backend Defaults to `false`.

spnego_ccache.description: Credential cache to use for SPNEGO in form type:residual

spnego_keytab.description: SPNEGO keytab base64-encoded or path to keytab in the form FILE:path

spnego_server_name.description: Force the use of a specific server name for SPNEGO

sync_ccache.description: Credentials cache to authenticate to kadmin for sync. Must be in the form TYPE:residual

sync_keytab.description: Keytab to authenticate to kadmin for sync. Must be base64-encoded or in the form TYPE:residual

sync_password.description: Password to authenticate to kadmin for sync

sync_principal.description: Principal to authenticate to kadmin for sync.

sync_users.description: Sync users from Kerberos into authentik Defaults to `true`.

sync_users_password.description: When a user changes their password, sync it back to Kerberos Defaults to `true`.

authorization_url.description: Manually configure OAuth2 URLs when `oidc_well_known_url` is not set.

oidc_jwks.description: Manually configure JWKS keys for use with machine-to-machine authentication. JSON format expected. Use jsonencode() to pass objects. Generated.

oidc_jwks_url.description: Automatically configure JWKS if not specified by `oidc_well_known_url`.

oidc_well_known_url.description: Automatically configure source from OIDC well-known endpoint. URL is taken as is, and should end with `.well-known/openid-configuration`.

profile_url.description: Manually configure OAuth2 URLs when `oidc_well_known_url` is not set.

request_token_url.description: Manually configure OAuth2 URLs when `oidc_well_known_url` is not set.

attributes.description: JSON format expected. Use jsonencode() to pass objects. Defaults to `{}`.

password.description: Optionally set the user's password. Changing the password in authentik will not trigger an update here.

fetch_certificate.description: If set to true, certificate data will be fetched. Defaults to `true`.

fetch_key.description: If set to true, private key data will be fetched. Defaults to `true`.
